channel.title: Ipbanning isnt working
channel.description: This guy keeps changing his IP address, and I need to know how to make it so if an Ip contains the ISP Paradise it autobans then when they log in or just not even let them on?

item.title: Ipbanning isnt working
item.dc:creator: @webbsta webbsta
item.description:
@webbsta wrote:

[QUOTE]
Uh I’m just wondering and I’ll ask here while we are talking about it, If you have a dynamic IP does it keep you from hosting a server?

[QUOTE/]
No, i have a dynamic IP, all that happens is that every time you connect or start your internet, your IP address is different from when you last used it, you don’t have a specific IP set for you, in other words a “static” IP, only thing you need to make sure you do with a dynamic IP is keep the domain you use for your server up to date, which is what no-ip DUC helps you do.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipbanning isnt working
item.dc:creator: @webbsta webbsta
item.description:
@webbsta wrote:

He might be using a proxy, if he is then there isn’t much you can do. if he just has a dynamic ip then everytime he changed his ip it will change from something like 255.255.255.255 to 255.255.255.256 in which case you use a * to represent a wild card such as 255.255.255.* but im not sure how to use wild cards with a server :s sorry, but maybe look on your firewall and see if you can block all connections from a certain address.

Read full topic
